title: Convergence
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2JBxPrn

by Thecasterofshadows

Valkyrie was an anomaly much like Anakin Skywalker. Midi-cholorian count higher than Yoda’s, but lower than Anakin’s. She was a slave before the Jedi found her and brought her to the temple to be trained. On a Mission, things took a terrible turn, making her go missing for a few years, three to be exact.

~All rights go to the creators of SW:CW

Words: 2190, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

title: Eclipse
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2FwOubm

by SpellCleaver

Luke and Leia, the twin children of Darth Vader and heirs to the Emperor himself, defect. When they do, it’s naturally a dream come true for the Rebellion and the mother they never knew, one that’s been a long time in the making.

But they have to get to that point first.

Or: Darth Vader unwittingly sends his children down the merry path of treason.

Words: 5485, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Star Wars Original Trilogy, Star Wars - All Media Types
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Luke Skywalker, Leia Organa, Anakin Skywalker | Darth Vader, Sheev Palpatine | Darth Sidious, Padmé Amidala, Ahsoka Tano, Wedge Antilles, Biggs Darklighter

summary: Semaine 12 • Cinéma Le grand écran a produit certains des personnages les plus emblématiques et les plus connus de notre époque....
caption:
Semaine 12 • Cinéma

Le grand écran a produit certains des personnages les plus emblématiques et les plus connus de notre époque. Volant parfois la vedette aux héros classiques des romans, fables et autres contes, ils peuplent désormais notre imaginaire collectif. Je prends pour ma part plaisir à découvrir leurs univers, me perdant parfois dans la lecture de leur histoire, fourmillant de détails et les rendant d’une absolue crédibilité malgré les créatures fantastiques ou vaisseaux gigantesques qui les peuplent. L’un d’entre eux, tout droit sorti de l’imaginaire de Georges Lucas, tient pour moi une place un peu particulière; il s’agit de celui de la Guerre des Étoiles. Et dans cette incroyable galaxie, au milieu de laquelle il fait bon se perdre, gravitent des Jedi, droïdes et extraterrestres auxquels il est facile de s’attacher. Yoda est de ceux-là. L’espiègle petit bonhomme vert est sans aucun doute le plus grand philosophe de toute l’histoire du cinéma!

blog.name: yourcloneboyfriend
blog.title: Your Clone Boyfriend
blog.description:
Asks are open ✉️

Headcanons and imagines galore.

Can be SFW or NSFW (tagged lemon 🍋), romantic or platonic it’s up to you. Just tell me your preference and the clone/s you love ❤️

summary: Hi! Could I request some hcs or fic for Rex? His female s/o comfort him after Umbara. Thank you <3
question: Hi! Could I request some hcs or fic for Rex? His female s/o comfort him after Umbara. Thank you <3
answer:
Hiiii omg you’re my very first request I’m so excited thank you!!

——————

  • You had been worried when Rex had stopped contacting you. It’s not like it hadn’t happened before, it’s just that usually there was warning and it was never for this long.
  • Your worry was getting the better of you and you were starting to loose hope. You had stopped yourself from trying to contact Rex directly or even Cody or Fivesvarious times
  • Eventually tho you got a knock on your door in the middle of the night.
  • There he was, not even out of his armor it looked like he had just arrived
  • Your excitement and relief died soon after it began when you say the look in his eyes
  • Something happened, something bad
  • You rushed him into your apartment and urged him to sit down
  • “Are you ok? What happened” you asked worriedly while placing a soft hand on his cheek. He just shook his head and covered his face with his hand “I can’t- I’m sorry” his voice was quiet “I’m so sorry” you shook your head “no no it’s ok, you don’t have to tell me”
  • You’d never seen him like this before, yes some missions were bad, but he’d never been like this. And you knew he couldn’t tell you.
  • You took his hands and squeezed them a bit “let’s get you cleaned up ok?” He took a few seconds to answer, as if he wasn’t all there.
  • You helped him remove his armor and guided him to the bathroom, you knew he’d been here many times but you didn’t know how else to help him.
  • After the shower you guided him to your bed and he sat down on the edge. “Do you want anything?” He shook his head, you nodded “why don’t we lay down then?” He didn’t say anything, instead he let you guide him into a comfortable position
  • You were both on your sides facing each other, Rex was doing everything he could to not look you in the eyes
  • You moved closer to him “hey, it’s ok” placed a soft hand on his arm “ you’re ok now” you spoke softly
  • He shook his head as tears swealled in his eyes “no it’s not- I did something I-” tears began falling from his eyes “no no no it’s ok, it’s ok” you pulled him to you and he held on to you like you were going to disappear
  • He sobbed into your shoulder as you petted his back softly and whispered sweet nothings in his ears. Telling him that everything was alright now, and that you weren’t going anywhere.
  • You wished he could stay, that he didn’t have to go back to that.
  • But he was here, at least until daylight. At least you could keep him safe until then.
